contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=June 2012}} The '''QSDK''' is a [[Streaming media|streaming]] [[scene graph]] retained-mode [[Application Programming Interface]] (API) combined with a cell-portal system to connect scene graphs. Audio and animation are fully supported. It is available on Macintosh, PlayStation 2 and Xbox platforms, and for free on [[Personal computer|PC]] platforms. ==External links== *[http://www.qubesoft.com/ Qube Software] *[http://qdn.qubesoft.com/ Q Developer Network] [[Category:3D scenegraph APIs]] {{compu-graphics-stub}}
